name: How do I transfer a survey project to another license/account?
title: How do I transfer a survey project to another license/account?
body:
Overview

This article explains how to transfer a survey project from one license or account to another in Questback. It covers the export and import process, as well as important considerations when transferring projects.

 

Information

Select “Project” from the export menu. You can then store the .gpx file on your computer. Your project is now stored in compressed form as a .gpx file. In order to import this project, you now have to click on “New project” in the new license/account and then switch to the “Import project” tab. Here, you can then upload the .gpx file and thus transfer it to the new license/account.

 

Important Considerations

When transferring a survey project, keep in mind the following:

  • The survey link changes during the import process.
  • If you have already sent the original link to test users, you have two options:
    1. Send the new link to all test users
    2. Keep the old project active to maintain the original link

 

FAQ

Will my survey responses be transferred with the project?

This article doesn't specifically address the transfer of survey responses. It's recommended to check with Questback support for information on transferring survey data along with the project.

Can I transfer a project between different versions of Questback?

The guide doesn't mention version compatibility. It's best to ensure both the source and destination accounts are using compatible versions of Questback before attempting a transfer.
